backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling user profiles, media feed items, likes, and access control with migration and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new feed structures and a migration function mapping old actor state to the new media-based format.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level features to related frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file involved in feed, upload, auth, and PWA features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables, dark mode, layout utilities, and safe-area handling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA metadata, manifest and icons, and root app mounting point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching of static assets, cache cleanup, and network-first fetch handling with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing auth state, profile setup, PWA service worker registration, and rendering the feed UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Form for setting a user's display name and saving it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedItem.ts: Renders a single feed item with video/image playback, like handling, double‑tap detection, and overlays.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedOverlay: Displays handle, caption, and optional controls overlaid at the bottom of a feed item.
frontend/src/components/feed/Interaction: Provides like, comment, and share buttons with counts and auth checks.
frontend/src/components/feed/SpeedContro: Dropdown control for adjusting video playback speed.
frontend/src/components/feed/UploadButto: Upload trigger that checks authentication and opens the upload dialog.
frontend/src/components/feed/UploadDialo: Dialog for selecting media, entering a caption, validating, and uploading with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoFeed.t: Scrollable vertical feed that loads items and tracks which item is active via IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDoubleTap.ts: Hook that detects double‑tap or double‑click gestures and triggers a callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching feed items, uploading media with progress, and toggling likes with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables, dark mode, layout resets, mobile-safe viewport behavior, and scrollbar/safe-area utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting App inside QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors tied to CSS variables, container settings, extended utilities, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, architecture notes, features, and assets for a TikTok-style feed with user uploads.
